meanings.definition: A list or schedule of duties or tasks to be carried out by individuals in rotation.
meanings.sent1: Every week, the teacher assigns a new rota for classroom chores.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff follows a strict rota to ensure all patients receive proper care.
meanings.sent3: The rota for who gets to walk the class pet is causing quite the stir among the students.
meanings.sent4: As the rota turned, it was finally my turn to lead the team project.
meanings.sent5: The rota system helped everyone take turns and share responsibilities equally.

meanings.definition: A wheel or disk that rotates on an axis.
meanings.sent1: The car's rota spun smoothly as it accelerated down the road.
meanings.sent2: The potter carefully shaped the clay on the spinning rota to create a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hitched a ride on the rota of the water wheel, enjoying the spin.
meanings.sent4: The rota of the Ferris wheel provided a breathtaking view of the entire fairground.
meanings.sent5: The rota of the windmill turned gracefully in the breeze, powering the nearby farm.
